channel.title: Delta Wearing items
channel.description: Hey guys I need some help. whenever I wear an item, the item that I worn before on the same spot goes to the first free slot in your inventory. Example. I'm wearing dharoks helm. If I wear some other helm, the dharoks helm should go to the spot where the other helm was, so not the first possible slot

item.title: Delta Wearing items
item.dc:creator: @loki2006 loki2006
item.description:
@loki2006 wrote:

This is how its supposed to be is it not? at least thats how it is on my server source…yes i even checked

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Wearing items
item.dc:creator: @Mario_PvP Mario PvP
item.description:
@Mario_PvP wrote:

Hey guys I need some help.
whenever I wear an item, the item that I worn before on the same spot goes to the first free slot in your inventory.
Example.
I’m wearing dharoks helm.
If I wear some other helm, the dharoks helm should go to the spot where the other helm was, so not the first possible slot

Read full topic
